caption.p: Surface rendering, measured and simulated X-ray fluorescence maps of a BrQ-treated infected red blood cell (iRBC) labeled A. ( A) Surface rendering of a soft X-ray tomography segmentation. ( B) Measured Fe X-ray fluorescence map. ( C) Measured Br X-ray fluorescence map. ( D) Simulated Br X-ray fluorescence map. Br atoms were evenly distributed over the surface of the digestive vacuole (DV) membrane, the parasite nucleus, and the parasite membrane with the density of 5 Ã— 10 3 atoms per square micrometer, and on the surface of hemozoin (Hz) crystals with a density corresponding to 10% BrQ surface coverage. ( E) Same simulation as D but without Br at the surface of Hz crystals.
